name: Bedlam
desc: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.

name: Flux
desc: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.

name: Chemical Rage
desc: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: The Swarm
desc: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

name: Earthshock
desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

name: Flame Guard
desc: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, leaving him unharmed.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.

name: Midnight Pulse
desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

name: Disruption
desc: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

name: Inner Vitality
desc: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.
